item.title: Brume VIII
item.description: Red Zone Licensing Status: N/A Traits: Fog - All shots beyond 8” are -1 to Hit.

item.title: Carpathium 9
item.description: Licensing Status: N/A Traits: Gloom - Max visibility 9“ Invasion Risk - +1 to invasion rolls 29-hour day Settlements Bacau (2024-01-23) Magura (suburb / neighborhood) (2024-01-23) Cutthroats (neighborhood) (2024-01-23) PatronTypeBenefitNotesSolari (Reade)Private Organization-Mr.

item.title: Caturix Prime
item.description: Licensing Status: N/A Traits: Weapon Licensing - +1 credit to weapon purchases and weapons from Trade table Invasion Risk - +1 to invasion rolls Unity Patrol - Cannot be invaded PatronTypeBenefitNotes RivalTypeNotes.

item.title: Goldeng 8
item.description: Licensing Status: 1 credit (forged) Traits: Free trade zone - One crew member per campaign turn can roll twice when using the Trade Table, and choose either result.

item.title: Karnak 6
item.description: Home of Holith’s Crater, where Captain’s wife and family died.

item.title: Planet Index
item.description: The order in which planets are visited in the story: Karnak 6 Sheun Prime Carpathium 9 Caturix Prime Goldeng 8 Trellium XII Thule VI Brume VIII Tattoon II space station Mentioned but not visited: Garthon 4 .

item.title: Sheun Prime
item.description: Simon’s home world Where the Captain recruited the crew .

item.title: Tattoon II
item.description: Red Zone Licensing Status: N/A Traits: Booming Economy - When rolling for post-battle credit rewards, any 1 on the dice is rerolled until it shows a score other than 1.

item.title: Thule VI
item.description: Red Zone Licensing Status: N/A Traits: Frozen - Any character making a Dash may opt to must slide.
